show_name: Crayon Shin-chan: Buriburi Ōkoku no Hihō (movie 2)
other_title: Shin chan en la isla del tesoro (Spanish)
クレヨンしんちゃん ブリブリ王国の秘宝 (Japanese)
蠟筆小新-不理不理王國的秘寶 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: The Nohara family unexpectedly wins a trip to the Buri Buri kingdom only to find out that the White Snake organization wants to kidnap Shinnosuke. The sinister group needs him to reach a mysterious treasure that is concealed in a secret location.
opening_theme: "Ora wa Ninki Mono" by Akiko Yajima
insert_song: "Aa Hate Shinai Jungle no Naka de" by Narahashi Miki, Fujiwara Keiji
